short_description: Estimate the predict values based on given ARIMA model.
long_description: Estimate the predict values based on parameters of ARIMA model original sereis and the residuals of original series.

input_tables.name: ModelTable
input_tables.description: Specifies the name of the table that contains the model. This table is the model table that is output by the Arima function.
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the name of the table that contains the model. This table is the model table that is output by the ta.arima function.

input_tables.name: ResidualTable
input_tables.description: Specifies the name of the table that contains the original input parameters and their residuals. This table is the residual table that is output by the Arima function.
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the name of the table that contains the original input parameters and their residuals. This table is the residual table that is output by the ta.arima function.

argument_clauses.name: TimestampColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the residual_table columns that specify the sequence (time points) of the original input parameters. The sequence must have uniform intervals.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the residual_table columns that specify the sequence (time points) of the original input parameters. The sequence must have uniform intervals.

argument_clauses.name: ValueColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the name of the column containing the time series data in residuals table. The default name is value.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the name of the column containing the time series data in residuals table. The default name is value.

argument_clauses.name: ResidualColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the name of the column containing the residual from  residuals table. The default name is residual.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the name of the column containing the residual from  residuals table. The default name is residual.

argument_clauses.name: StepAhead
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the number of steps to forecast after the end of the time series. This value must be a positive integer.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the number of steps to forecast after the end of the time series. This value must be a positive integer.
